name: cse110-sp21-group02
description: We are creating a web-app incorporating generative AI.

scripts.test: npx jest --config jest.config.unit.js && npx jest --config jest.config.integration.js
scripts.lint: docker run -e RUN_LOCAL=true -e USE_FIND_ALGORITHM=true -e FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE=".* images/.*" -e FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE=".*source/.*" -e LINTER_RULES_PATH="/" -e JAVASCRIPT_ES_CONFIG_FILE=".eslintrc.json" -e VALIDATE_JAVASCRIPT_STANDARD=false -v %cd%:/tmp/lint github/super-linter

author: cse110-sp23-group02
